nodes.bodyText: Since this is the URL to the results, a shorter name is preferable, like trivy.
Symbol is missing, trivy would be a good name
From the website it looks like there is an icon available. Does it have an oss license so we can include it here?
trivy is available under Apache Common 2.0 license. I do not know if the logo has an additional license or trademark.
have resized the logo to 48x48 and 24x24. I'm not sure if it is too pixelated now
This will deactivate copying of the affected files, is this intended?
there are no affected files, because the scan is done in a temporary image based on the original image. however, in my opinion it makes no sense to copy affected files anywhere.
I think wrapping in {@code and <pre> would look better
Can you please add a small test to https://github.com/jenkinsci/warnings-ng-plugin/blob/master/plugin/src/test/java/io/jenkins/plugins/analysis/warnings/steps/ParsersITest.java

This is a short label for the URL, what about Trivy?
It should be part of the file Messages.properties.
The next time it would be helpful if you can create the PR in a branch of your fork. Otherwise the PR contains a lot of unrelated changes, hard to review.

Labels should be capitalized.
I still think that the text in Jenkins side panel would look better if you use Trivy rather than Aquasec Trivy Vulnerability Scanner.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -127,6 +127,7 @@ Warnings.RFLint.ParserName=Robot Framework Lint
 Warnings.LinuxKernelOutput.ParserName=Linux Kernel Output Parser
 Warnings.WarningsPlugin.ParserName=Warnings Plugin Native Format
 Warnings.ProtoLint.ParserName=ProtoLint
+Warnings.Trivy.ParserName=aquasec trivy vulnerability scanner
